## Publishing to Artifact Hub

If your charts are not yet published to Artifact Hub, follow these steps:

### Prerequisites

1. Charts must be published to a Helm repository (GitHub Pages, etc.)
2. Repository must be publicly accessible
3. Charts must follow Helm best practices

### Publishing Steps

1. **Create Artifact Hub Repository Metadata**

   Add `artifacthub-repo.yml` to your chart repository root:

   ```yaml
   repositoryID: <your-repository-id>
   owners:
     - name: <your-name>
       email: <your-email>
   ```

2. **Add Repository to Artifact Hub**

   - Go to https://artifacthub.io/
   - Sign in with GitHub
   - Navigate to Control Panel > Add Repository
   - Enter your Helm repository URL

3. **Verify Publisher**

   Add the provided verification metadata file to your GitHub repository root.

### Chart Annotations

Enhance chart metadata with Artifact Hub annotations in `Chart.yaml`:

```yaml
annotations:
  artifacthub.io/changes: |
    - kind: added
      description: Initial release
  artifacthub.io/containsSecurityUpdates: "false"
  artifacthub.io/prerelease: "false"
```

## Artifact Hub Badges

Once published, you can add Artifact Hub badges to your READMEs:

### Repository Badge

```markdown
[![Artifact Hub](https://img.shields.io/endpoint?url=https://artifacthub.io/badge/repository/sb-helm-charts)](https://artifacthub.io/packages/search?repo=sb-helm-charts)
```

### Package Badge

```markdown
[![Artifact Hub](https://img.shields.io/endpoint?url=https://artifacthub.io/badge/repository/sb-helm-charts)](https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/sb-helm-charts/{chart-name})
```
